# Load in libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

# Read in csv
```{r}
decathlon_clean <- read_csv(here("clean_data/decathlon_clean.csv"))
```

# 1. Who had the longest long jump seen in the data?
```{r}
decathlon_clean %>% 
  arrange(desc(`long_jump_(m)`)) %>% 
  head(1)
```
